about.title: About Our Center
about.subtitle: Discover our journey in bringing authentic Kerala Ayurveda to Sri Lanka

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a vision to bring the authentic healing traditions of Kerala to Sri Lanka, our center has been serving the community for over two decades. We specialize in traditional Ayurvedic treatments that have been passed down through generations.
story.paragraph2: Our team of experienced practitioners combines ancient wisdom with modern understanding to provide comprehensive healthcare solutions that treat not just symptoms, but the root causes of illness.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: We believe in the power of natural healing and personalized care

holistic.title: Holistic Approach
holistic.description: We treat the whole person - mind, body, and spirit - not just individual symptoms or conditions.

authentic.title: Authentic Treatments
authentic.description: All our treatments follow traditional Kerala Ayurvedic methods, using genuine herbs and time-tested techniques.

personalized.title: Personalized Care
personalized.description: Every treatment plan is customized based on individual constitution, health condition, and wellness goals.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: Meet our qualified practitioners who are dedicated to your wellness journey

members.name: Dr. Rajitha Perera
members.bio: With over 20 years of experience in traditional Ayurveda, Dr. Perera specializes in chronic disease management and panchakarma treatments.

members.name: Dr. Amali Silva
members.bio: Expert in women's health and pediatric Ayurveda, Dr. Silva brings 15 years of clinical experience to our center.

members.name: Dr. Nimal Jayawardena
members.bio: Specialized in detoxification and rejuvenation therapies, Dr. Jayawardena has trained extensively in Kerala's traditional methods.

facility.title: Our Facility
facility.paragraph1: Our center is designed to provide a peaceful and healing environment that supports your wellness journey. We maintain the highest standards of cleanliness and use only authentic Ayurvedic medicines and oils.
facility.paragraph2: From consultation rooms to treatment facilities, every space is thoughtfully designed to promote relaxation and healing, following traditional Ayurvedic principles.
